fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article misreported the author Bernardine Evaristo as saying, in relation to Rose Bruford College, that “around 30% of its students are from a black or minority ethnic background”. In fact, as she said, the figure is around 13% (Evaristo is first black female president of top drama school, 10 December, page 15). • Other recently amended articles include: Oasis and Warehouse close to collapsing into administration Chinese Covid-19 vaccine has 86% efficacy, UAE says James Corden proves why straight actors should think twice before playing gay World Cup qualifying draw: England play Poland as Wales again face Belgium NHS told not to give Covid vaccine to those with history of allergic reactions ‘It’s very frustrating’: the Covid inequality dividing Blackburn Trump’s health secretary meets Biden team to ensure smooth vaccine rollout Sturgeon’s husband ‘contradicted’ her evidence to Alex Salmond inquiry Rats besiege New York Chipotle, eating avocados and attacking staff
